column4: anyone that feels like helping a n00b, please send me a private message.  I seem to be lost
well, I get the difference between root and sudo, but is there a way to do root things in the file browser?  say I want to create or delete a file in /etc
when I try it, it just tells me that access is denied, rather than giving me a chance to enter the password
better do it using the command line,   sudo rm , you can always drag drop the file in the terminal after you wrote the first bit
